item.title: KivyMD
item.description: What is KivyMD Is a collection of Material Design compliant widgets for use with, Kivy cross-platform graphical framework a framework for cross-platform, touch-enabled graphical applications. The project’s goal is to approximate Google’s Material Design spec as close as possible without sacrificing ease of use or application performance. https://kivymd.readthedocs.io/en/latest/# After setting up your environment as explained in Hello World install KivyMD in a Terminal window as follows: pip3 install --trusted-host pypi.
